Unique_IdentifierObject.description: Display information used to describe an instance of an object. This 'optional' information is for outbound descriptive purposes only and is not processed on inbound Workday Web Services requests.

Unique_IdentifierObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.

Unique_IdentifierObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

description: Reference to an existing Web Item.

Web_Item_Attributes_Data.description: The description of the web item.  This data is not used for inbound requests and any data provided in this element will be ignored.

SupplierObject.description: Display information used to describe an instance of an object. This 'optional' information is for outbound descriptive purposes only and is not processed on inbound Workday Web Services requests.

SupplierObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.

SupplierObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

Web_Item_Attributes_Data.description: The supplier associated with the web item.  This data is not used for inbound requests and any data provided in this element will be ignored.
The supplier's item identifier associated with the web item.  This data is not used for inbound requests and any data provided in this element will be ignored.

Spend_CategoryObject.description: Display information used to describe an instance of an object. This 'optional' information is for outbound descriptive purposes only and is not processed on inbound Workday Web Services requests.

Spend_CategoryObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.

Spend_CategoryObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

Web_Item_Attributes_Data.description: The spend category associated with the web item.  This data is not used for inbound requests and any data provided in this element will be ignored.

Purchase_ItemObject.description: Display information used to describe an instance of an object. This 'optional' information is for outbound descriptive purposes only and is not processed on inbound Workday Web Services requests.

Purchase_ItemObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.

Purchase_ItemObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

Web_Item_Attributes_Data.description: The purchase item linked to the web item.

Unit_of_MeasureObject.description: Display information used to describe an instance of an object. This 'optional' information is for outbound descriptive purposes only and is not processed on inbound Workday Web Services requests.

Unit_of_MeasureObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.

Unit_of_MeasureObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

Web_Item_Attributes_Data.description: The ordering unit of measure of the web item.  This data is not used for inbound requests and any data provided in this element will be ignored.
The conversion factor of the web item's ordering unit of measure to the linked purchase item's base unit of measure.

validation.validation: Enter a purchase item that belongs to the web item spend category ( [spend_cat] ).
